channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟡 17:30 Alarm lifted in Kharkiv region. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- Kupyansky district- Lipetsk territorial community- Vovchansk territorial community
item.description: 🟡 17:30 Alarm lifted in Kharkiv region. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- Kupyansky district- Lipetsk territorial community- Vovchansk territorial community#Kharkiv_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.
